cleaned_text: Partners with 560 Schools to Provide Park Access to over 450,000 Students Across Los Angeles County https://parks.lacounty.gov/wp-content/themes/blade/images/empty/thumbnail.jpg 150 150 Parks & Recreation //parks.lacounty.gov/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/parks.seal_.white_.png](https://parks.lacounty.gov/la-county-parks-partners-with-560-schools-to-provide-park-access-to-over-450000-students-across-los-angeles-county/) LA County Parks Partners with 560 Schools to Provide Park Access to over 450,000 Students Across Los Angeles County FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: August 16, 2023 MEDIA CONTACT: Lorena Alamillo (626) 224-0778 // lorena@vpepr.com County of Los Angeles Department of Parks and Recreation
